attributes.action: immediately resign along with his government as we the people no longer have any confidence in them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want Brown & co to go because we do not have any confidence in this government. Signing away powers to unelected eurocrats after breaking a promise to hold a referendum was the final straw. Loosing millions of sensitive data files with no one in government seemingly accountable or doing anything about it. Breaking the covenant with our armed forces and the defence minister doing two jobs. A vote of no confidence in the Home Secretary and the Police considering striking. Mass uncontrolled immigration again with no-one doing anything or being accountable. Failing schools and hospitals. The list goes on and on. We have had enough of lies and spin and demand this government resign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
